item.title: Thrust Management System (Including Autothrottle System) Thrust Mode Select Panel – CON Switch

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided Max Continuous Thrust is set manually if required.

numlitem.para: Max Continuous Thrust must be set manually by reference to QRH.

placard.para: Placard MCT Switch "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
